hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path of #gold#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Huge Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Damp√©'s Hut#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: Gossip Stone Shuffle must be on. I'm normally in Zora's Domain!

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #4# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Din's Fire# and #a Bow#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #1# major item.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of #gold#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Eyeball Frog# can be found in #the Haunted Wasteland#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Huge Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple GS Song of Time Room

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that most of the water in Hyrule flows through King Zora's buttocks.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Small Key# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest
